RAK.NZ.summary: Rakon Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells frequency control products for various applications in Asia, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company provides crystal resonators, tuning fork crystals, standard SMD crystals, crystal oscillators, voltage control crystal oscillators and clock oscillators, temperature compensated crystal oscillators, oven controlled crystal oscillators, and oven controlled surface acoustic wave (SAW) oscillators. It also offers a range of crystal filters, including bandpass filters, notch/stop band filters, linear phase or constant group delay filters, phase and/or amplitude matching filters, and monolithic filters; and frequency multipliers. The company's products are used in telecommunications, global positioning, and space and defense, and other markets. In addition, it is involved in the provision of financing and marketing support services; and research and development activities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.
